greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n, k) = 1 + n * (n - k) for 1 <= k <= n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 1..100 of triangle, flattened
formula: Row sums: Sum_{k=1..n} T(n,k) = A006000(n-1) for n > 0.
Recurrence: T(n,k) = T(n,k-1) - n for 1 < k <= n with initial values T(n,1) = n^2-n+1 for n > 0.
Recurrence: T(n,k) = T(n-1,k) + 2*n-k-1 for 1 <= k < n with initial values T(n,n) = 1 for n > 0.
program: (MAGMA) [[1+n*(n-k): k in [1..n]]: n in [1..12]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 22 2019
(Sage) [[1+n*(n-k) for k in (1..n)] for n in (1..12)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 22 2019
xref: First column is A002061. Second column is A000290. Third column is A028387.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Feb 10 2019
